website_summaries.verdict: A stability shoe with a streamlined look and a good-looking heathered upper design.
pros: The upper fits well and accommodates different foot shapes
The shoe is also available in countless colorways
Features comfortable cushioning that's supportive and responsive
cons: Shoe runs small and has a narrow fit

customer_reviews.title: They aren't as comfortable as I thought they'd be
customer_reviews.text: These are way uglier than the picture. They aren't as comfortable as I thought they'd be. I just wish Underarmour would make a Spine successor. That's the shoe I'm looking to replace because my Spines are getting holes. This shoe seems cheaply made and will probably not last long.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerPerson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but sizes small
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and look great just as expected. But, I am usually a size 11 so that's what I ordered. They were too small for me. I would recommend getting a half size or maybe a full size larger than your usual size.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Green

customer_reviews.title: Tracking & Shoe Size Issues
customer_reviews.text: Pro : Shoes are of expected quality. Cons : (1) Tracking system was not updated frequently (2) Shoes were a bit smaller in size perhaps of the cutting. Under Armour and other sellers in Amazon or anywhere else, it would helpful if they provide size chart just like some clothing brands to ensure the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: I. Ramli

customer_reviews.title: a little tight, but stretched out.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of the shoe. i usually wear 11 in underarmour shoes. these were kind of tight when i got them and i thought about sending them back but didnt. the more i wore them the more they stretched out to fit my feet. i teach so im on my feet a lot and these have helped my feet not be tired.
customer_reviews.author: B85

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time, it fit as expected, it looks good, and it run just fine by me. It will keep 5 stars if it passed a year of weariness. Unlike Nike...worn out less than 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: ... size bigger than he regularly wears and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews and ordered a size bigger than he regularly wears and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I took the advice of others and ordered a half size up and they fit perfectly. I absolutely love them so far. They are very light and have good support.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzonator

customer_reviews.title: Good, but runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Outside of being somewhat small, the shoe is great. I do however need to replace the laces for something more sturdy. Customer support was amazing on this & overall I'm very happy with this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Dante McFiddleFaddle

customer_reviews.title: Great color...great quality...fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find navy sneakers, so I was thrilled to find these. Husband really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel great and I will probably buy them again. Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers ever! Hiked through Italy wearing these and was always cool and comfortable! Bought two more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: NDell

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Look good and lightweight. Saucony and UA are my go to running shoes. Nice styles and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. V

customer_reviews.title: It's protect my back while running and it feel good when I use it
customer_reviews.text: It's protect my back while running and it feel good when I use it
customer_reviews.author: MR MOHAMED AL MALKI

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Food confy shoes, very good for walks on the park and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't had these but 3.5 months and already has holes in the mesh material near the baby toe area. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fraser

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and so durable and easy to clean( not that you can see dirt). Love these shoes look just as good in person as in the picture and love the fit! Super comfy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking at my job, I found these shoes to be very comfortable and supportive. I even wore them out on rugged trails in Colorado, and the high abrasion rubber withstood it all. Very nice shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I would like to know how to make the change
customer_reviews.text: Hello ... I have an inconvenience when receiving the tennis, which I got two of the same right foot ... I would like to know how to make the change ... thanks
customer_reviews.author: giovanni medina

customer_reviews.title: They are incredibly light and comfortable. Personally for running shoes I opt for shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these for running shoes or other physical activity where I would put much strain on them. I mostly use them as a casual and walking shoe. They are incredibly light and comfortable. Edited: In less than 2 months of using these for walking the side blew out near the toe. I had a pair prior where it did similar after 8 months. This isn't acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: vanderwal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't the best shoe. Rubbed the back of my foot pretty bad but very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Miles Waltz

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs slightly small in size.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. They for slightly small in length. I wear 9.5 in all my other UA shoes and these just barely fit. I can feel my big toe just touch the front of the shoe when walking. If I were to order again, I would go with a 10. Please don't mistake this review, I really like these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: WeeBay

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 60 days....
customer_reviews.text: I Never leave 1 star reviews...check my review history... but these $110 shoes lasted me just 60 days. I never even used them as for anything that would be brutal on them. Wore them 4-5 days per week...and I work in an office setting. Then they literally started falling apart. This is my 1st pair of under armour shoes and I LOVE the brand.... but I won't ever invest that kind of money in their shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Good arch support. Stylish. (I am a girl. Bought a men's size because I couldn't find my size in women's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of Under Armour shoes I've purchased and I love them. So light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Under Armour shoes I've purchased and I love them. So light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: m32blackcrow

customer_reviews.title: Might make a good racing shoe but it's not comfortable for a casual ...
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff, little cushion. Might make a good racing shoe but it's not comfortable for a casual run. The pair I received had a fault in the material on the tongue I had to trim and modify to wear comfortably. I'd pass if asked to buy again. Flyknits and ultraboosts are both much better running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in GA

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable according to my husband
customer_reviews.text: They are Under Armour what more can I say. They fit exactly how we expect Under Armour to fit and wear. They are extremely comfortable according to my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Green

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not look how I thought it would. Also too small to fit. Sent the shoes back.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 16 year old son and he loves them! He says they fit well and give great support to his flat feet! He's a picky guy so when he got these in the mail, he was very satisfied with the look and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fits fine. So far a good running shoe for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a whole size up from watching reviews. The shoes fits fine. So far a good running shoe for a reasonably price.
customer_reviews.author: richard lee

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Bandit 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Heathered upper is light, breathable & extremely stretchable. Seamless internal heel cup for a locked-in, anatomical fit throughout the foot. Smooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next-to-skin support & comfort. Firm external heel counter for additional support that keeps the back of the foot in place. Unique tongue construction connects to the upper to stay put & further enhance fit. Molded Micro G footbed takes the shape of your foot for great cushioning & fit. Two-piece Charged Cushioning midsole is firmer below the heel & softer below the forefoot for a blend of support & comfort that‘s built to perform. Rubber outsole provides full ground contact with deep flex grooves for extra flexibility where you need it most. High abrasion rubber added to high wear areas on the heel for increased durability . Weight: 9.8 oz.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Heathered upper is light, breathable & extremely stretchable
Seamless internal heel cup for a locked in, anatomical fit throughout the foot
Smooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next to skin support & comfort
Firm external heel counter for additional support that keeps the back of the foot in place
Unique tongue construction connects to the upper to stay put & further enhance fit
